Articles.Content: I've heard a few YouTubers i watch refer to themselves or others as the KSP Media Group; so i thought as we had had an update on the Development Team; could we also have an update on whose in this media group? Unless i have been stupid; and either there is one, or its not an "official" group, but just KSP YouTubers/live streamers in general.

I have never heard of these youtubers nor heard any refer to themselves this way.

Subscription boxes work well enough.
I've searched but I can't find an overview of who is in the media group at the moment unfortunately.

Well, hoc, pleb, skunky and pd played payday as the ksp media group, and pdtv recently added his module to the IYMSS, having named some of his kerbals after some youtubers in the group, maybe its just an unofficial name for any ksp YouTubers then

Or it's related with the KSP news to reopen KSPTV

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/32948-KSP-TV-Broadcaster-Applications-CLOSED

The KSP media group is a group of youtubers selected by SQUAD because of the quality of their work. They were notably asked by SQUAD to make some trailers for KSP and one of those became the official KSP trailer which can be seen on Steam. You can view it as a partnership : SQUAD supports them (somewhat) officially, so their work is more visible and SQUAD gets free high-quality videos (somewhat) promoting their game .

There was a list of the media group members before, but then the great forum wipe happened.
